description.value: You've begun your training as a Speaker. Select divine or primal. If you selected divine, you're a Faithspeaker. If you selected primal, you're a Greenspeaker. If you've already made this decision (such as due to being a budding speaker) you must select the same Speaker you previously chose. This choice can't be changed. If you're a Faithspeaker, you can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Bless] once per day as a divine innate spell; if you're a Greenspeaker, you can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Fleet Step] once per day as a primal innate spell.

value.value: budding speaker centaur heritage or the ability to cast a divine or primal spell
